description: This file defines a utility class `ThunderUtils` that provides static methods for interacting with the Thunder service framework, including retrieving service state and creating Thunder controllers based on a callsign. It also includes licensing information, macro definitions, and necessary includes.

classes.name: ThunderUtils
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods to interact with Thunder services in the framework.

methods.name: uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & callsign,PluginHost::IShell::state & state)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified service identified by its callsign, returning a status code.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::JSONRPC::LinkType<WPEFramework::Core::JSON::IElement>> getThunderControllerClient(std::string callsign="")
methods.description: Creates and returns a shared pointer to a Thunder controller client linked to a specified callsign, with a default parameter.

ctags.name: getServiceState
ctags.pattern: /^    static uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell* shell, const string& callsign, PluginHos/
